lossBroughtForward.title: Loss brought forward
lossBroughtForward.description: Loss brought forward from earlier years set off against this year’s profits

privateUseAdjustment.title: Private use adjustment
privateUseAdjustment.description: Any expenses incurred not solely for the property business

balancingCharge.title: Balancing charge
balancingCharge.description: If an item for which capital allowance was claimed has been sold, given away or is no longer in use
